mapred

Class JobTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • mapred.JobTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, JobTrackerInterface

    public class JobTracker
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements JobTrackerInterface
    This class has to be deployed on the master node. It coordinates all the slave node, dispatch the tasks to the nodes, monitoring all the status of nodes and jobs.
    Author:
    menglonghe, sidilin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        jobConf - the programmer's configuration about the job

        reducer - Reducer class and name
